channel.title: CVE Feed for TEAM JOHNLONG SOFTWARE CO., LTD. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TEAM JOHNLONG SOFTWARE CO., LTD. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-41675|2024-08-03T12:49:43.449Z -- team%20johnlong%20software%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- maild%20mail%20server
item.description: A remote attacker with general user privilege can inject malicious code in the form content of Raiden MAILD Mail Server website. Other users export form content as CSV file can trigger arbitrary code execution and allow the attacker to perform arbitrary system operation or disrupt service on the user side.

item.title: CVE-2022-41676|2024-08-03T12:49:43.436Z -- team%20johnlong%20software%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- maild%20mail%20server
item.description: Raiden MAILD Mail Server website mail field has insufficient filtering for user input. A remote attacker with general user privilege can send email using the website with malicious JavaScript in the input field, which triggers XSS (Reflected Cross-Site Scripting) attack to the mail recipient.
